summary: The script prepares a voice activity detection (VAD) dataset by gathering speech and background audio files, optionally downloading demo data, extracting archives, generating varied noise samples, rebalancing the class distribution according to a chosen strategy, splitting the data into training, validation, and test sets, and writing JSON manifest files that describe the resulting dataset structure.
business_intent: Create a balanced and properly partitioned VAD training dataset with accompanying metadata to support downstream speech activity detection model development.
